comment: This module implements a base64 encoder and decoder.

name: encode
description: encodes <cite>s</cite> into base64 representation. After <cite>lineLen</cite> characters, a <cite>newline</cite> is added.
code:
proc encode*[T: SomeInteger | char](s: openarray[T]; lineLen = 75; 
                                    newLine = "\x0D\x0A"): string

name: encode
description: encodes <cite>s</cite> into base64 representation. After <cite>lineLen</cite> characters, a <cite>newline</cite> is added.
code: proc encode*(s: string; lineLen = 75; newLine = "\x0D\x0A"): string

name: decode
description: decodes a string in base64 representation back into its original form. Whitespace is skipped.
